name: Mortal Kombat & Mortal Kombat II
description: Mortal KombatThe #1 arcade smash that started it all is here!Mortal Kombat IIThe Kombat Kontinues... the fierce Kombatants of Mortal Kombat II battle to defeat Shao Kahn!Nothing can prepare you...Together on one game pak for the first time the ultimate fighting experience...Mortal Kombat & Mortal Kombat II - The Most lethal combo ever created!!!
